name: MLWordTagger.ModelParameters
desc: Parameters that specify model training parameters and validation data.

items.name: init(validation: MLWordTagger.ModelParameters.ValidationData, algorithm: MLWordTagger.ModelAlgorithmType, language: NLLanguage?)
items.desc: Creates model parameters for a word tagger with the specified validation data, algorithm, and language.

items.name: enum MLWordTagger.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The type of algorithm that a word tagger uses.

items.name: enum MLWordTagger.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: The validation data that a word tagger uses.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the model parameters.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the model parameters that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the model parameters in a playground.
